data.description:
All things Linux and Linux operating systems. PC, mobile, IoT, you name it!

Want to switch away from Windows or macOS? The answer is Linux.

Linux was created by a Finnish student, Linus Torvalds, who stated in a typically humble manner of Finns that it "won't be anything big and professional". 

Nowadays Linux is practically everywhere. Maybe check out your toaster for starters?

Powerful and popular Linux distributions to get into a world of user freedom:

* [Ubuntu](https://ubuntu.com/#download)
* [Pop!_OS](https://pop.system76.com/)
* [Fedora](https://getfedora.org/en/workstation/)
* [MX Linux](https://mxlinux.org/)
* [Linux Mint](https://www.linuxmint.com)
* [Debian](https://www.debian.org/) 
* [Garuda Linux](https://garudalinux.org/)

data.description:

- Put the platform in the title. Ex [Steam]
- No free to play games

data.description:
Nuclear power is the use of sustained nuclear fission to generate heat and electricity. Nuclear power plants provided about 5.7% of the world's energy and 13% of the world's electricity, in 2012. In 2013, the IAEA report that there are 437 operational nuclear power reactors (although not all are producing electricity), in 31 countries. More than 150 naval vessels using nuclear propulsion have been constructed. 

This guild is for nuclear discussion in terms of power, industrial applications, fusion, fission, as well as proliferation concerns.

Wikipedia: [nuclear](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nuclear_power)
data.description_html:
Nuclear power is the use of sustained nuclear fission to generate heat and electricity. Nuclear power plants provided about 5.7% of the world's energy and 13% of the world's electricity, in 2012. In 2013, the IAEA report that there are 437 operational nuclear power reactors (although not all are producing electricity), in 31 countries. More than 150 naval vessels using nuclear propulsion have been constructed.

This guild is for nuclear discussion in terms of power, industrial applications, fusion, fission, as well as proliferation concerns.

Wikipedia: nuclear

guildmasters.bio: Nuclear engineer with a passion for free speech.

data.description:
Place where people document the fall of Microsoft Windows. 

Windows 10 for instance is a privacy nightmare. Reading the EULA before installation and accepting it confirms all of your information to belong to Microsoft. 

You practically do NOT own your computer or control what happens in it, using Microsoft Windows. 

Many people seem terrified of freedom for one reason or another. In growing numbers though, people are choosing freedom when ever it actually is possible and it has never been more so than currently!

Freedom respecting operating systems and software in general are all there to replace the Microsoft ones.
data.description_html:

Many people seem terrified of freedom for one reason or another. In growing numbers though, people are choosing freedom when ever it actually is possible and it has never been more so than currently!

data.description:
Documenting the collapse of the United States in real time.

What is collapse? 
Collapse is a transformation of a society/civilization from one mode to another. You can learn more about collapse of the current global society [here](https://ruqqus.com/post/vgj/how-to-enjoy-the-end-of).

This guild is not meant to push any political narrative, instead it is meant to take an objective look into the current state of things in the United States. This guild is not right/left, anti/pro American, nor wishing for the death of America.

This guild's purpose is to archive and document the collapse of the US in real time, shown in newspapers, articles, videos, images, trends, etc.

Only rules is that the posts must fit the guild's purpose, no NSFW content, follow Ruqqus TOS, and no brigading/harassment of users.
data.description_html:

This guild is not meant to push any political narrative, instead it is meant to take an objective look into the current state of things in the United States. This guild is not right/left, anti/pro American, nor wishing for the death of America.

This guild's purpose is to archive and document the collapse of the US in real time, shown in newspapers, articles, videos, images, trends, etc.

Only rules is that the posts must fit the guild's purpose, no NSFW content, follow Ruqqus TOS, and no brigading/harassment of users.
